name: Transaction naming convention
description: SAP transactions should begin with Y or Z  (ex: z001). This reports shows all the SAP transactions not starting with Y or Z. The prefix is a parameter at can be changed at will.
output:
This report lists all ABAP Transactions that does not respect the naming conventions.
It provides the following information:
ABAP Transaction full name
rationale: For readability aspects, naming conventions must be respected.
reference:
Enhancing the Quality of ABAP Development, 
Meijs-Krouwels-Heulmans-Sommen, SAP Press
ISBN 1-59229-030-2
remediation: Change name according to the naming convention.
